text: greetings I'm Matt word and I'm here at
the AWS headquarters in Seattle to talk
to you about a new feature of Amazon
Aurora which lets you Fire custom logic
in response to changes in your data with
AWS Lambda Lambda functions are
triggered automatically letting you
extend the capabilities of the database
invoke actions on other apps or make
calls to other AWS services and data
stores you could use this to update
real-time dashboards transform or
validate data for application
integration or even augment records in
your database with the result of
predictive models from Amazon machine
learning Lambda functions only run when
they are needed and you only pay for
what you use which means you don't need
to maintain a full stack for functions
which are triggered infrequently and
because Lambda scales automatically to
extremely high levels of requests you
don't have to worry about provisioning
or managing servers at Peak Aurora and
Lambda integration is available for all
customers today thanks a
lot
